name: Sphetory
description: Here is a first-person puzzle game that takes place in an unknown world full of dangers and mysteries. The player will have to open the door, press the button and look for passages to find a way out of this huge maze. Of the things that he could use to get out only ball that physical properties very similar to the ball. But that's not all, has the ability to keep the ball flight trajectory. Through this the player can launch itself on this path.
